import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useLocation } from '../contexts/LocationContext'; import { MapPin, Search, Utensils, Calendar, Star, Heart, ArrowRight, Users, Clock, Shield } from 'lucide-react'; const HomePage: React.FC = () => { const { currentLocation, getCurrentLocation, isLoading } = useLocation(); const features = [ { icon: Utensils, title: 'Restaurant Discovery', description: 'Find the best restaurants near you with detailed reviews, ratings, and photos.' }, { icon: Calendar, title: 'Event Discovery', description: 'Discover local events, concerts, and activities happening around you.' }, { icon: MapPin, title: 'Location-Based', description: 'Get personalized recommendations based on your current location.' }, { icon: Star, title: 'User Reviews', description: 'Read and write reviews to help others discover great places.' }, { icon: Heart, title: 'Favorites', description: 'Save your favorite restaurants and events for quick access.' }, { icon: Users, title: 'Community', description: 'Join a community of food lovers and event enthusiasts.' } ]; const stats = [ { label: 'Restaurants', value: '10,000+', icon: Utensils }, { label: 'Events', value: '5,000+', icon: Calendar }, { label: 'Users', value: '50,000+', icon: Users }, { label: 'Reviews', value: '100,000+', icon: Star }, ]; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Discover Amazing Places Near You

Find the best restaurants and local events based on your location, preferences, and current time.

{/* Location Button */}
{currentLocation ? (
{currentLocation.address || `${currentLocation.lat.toFixed(4)}, ${currentLocation.lng.toFixed(4)}`}
) : ( )}
{/* CTA Buttons */}
Find Restaurants Find Events
{/* Stats Section */}
{stats.map((stat) => { const Icon = stat.icon; return (
{stat.value}
{stat.label}
); })}
{/* Features Section */}

Why Choose LocalGuide?

We combine the power of multiple APIs to give you the most comprehensive local discovery experience.

{features.map((feature) => { const Icon = feature.icon; return (

{feature.title}

{feature.description}

); })}
{/* How It Works Section */}

How It Works

Get started in just a few simple steps

1

Share Your Location

Allow us to access your location or enter your address to get started.

2

Browse Recommendations

Explore restaurants and events near you with detailed information and reviews.

3

Save & Review

Save your favorites and share your experiences with the community.

{/* CTA Section */}

Ready to Discover?

Join thousands of users who are already discovering amazing places near them.

Get Started Free Browse Now
); }; export default HomePage;
